Ec2Config.description: The subnet and security group that DataSync uses to access target EFS file system.

SecurityGroupArns.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the security groups that are configured for the Amazon EC2 resource.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:security-group/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupArns.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the security groups that are configured for the Amazon EC2 resource.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetArn.description: The ARN of the subnet that DataSync uses to access the target EFS file system.
SubnetArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the subnet that DataSync uses to access the target EFS file system.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):ec2:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:subnet/.*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Ec2Config.markdownDescription:
The subnet and security group that DataSync uses to access target EFS file system.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for an AWS resource tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9\s+=._:@/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EfsFilesystemArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS file system.
EfsFilesystemArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS file system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):elasticfilesystem:[a-z\-0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:file-system/fs-.*$  
Update requires: Replacement

AccessPointArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS Access point that DataSync uses when accessing the EFS file system.
AccessPointArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Amazon EFS Access point that DataSync uses when accessing the EFS file system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):elasticfilesystem:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:access-point/fsap-[0-9a-f]{8,40}$  
Update requires: Replacement

FileSystemAccessRoleArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM role that the DataSync will assume when mounting the EFS file system.
FileSystemAccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS IAM role that the DataSync will assume when mounting the EFS file system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.*$  
Update requires: Replacement

InTransitEncryption.description: Protocol that is used for encrypting the traffic exchanged between the DataSync Agent and the EFS file system.
InTransitEncryption.markdownDescription:
Protocol that is used for encrypting the traffic exchanged between the DataSync Agent and the EFS file system.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | TLS1_2  
Update requires: Replacement

Subdirectory.description: A subdirectory in the location's path. This subdirectory in the EFS file system is used to read data from the EFS source location or write data to the EFS destination.
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
A subdirectory in the location's path. This subdirectory in the EFS file system is used to read data from the EFS source location or write data to the EFS destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon EFS file system location that is created.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon EFS file system location that is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the EFS location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the EFS location that was described.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 4356  
Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw)://[a-zA-Z0-9.\-/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
